section.section: The planning commission consists of seven members who shall represent as many different geographical areas of the county as is possible.
A member of the county commissioners may not sit on the planning commission.
The term of a member of the planning commission is 3 years.
The terms of the members of the planning commission shall be staggered.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: Each year, the county commissioners shall appoint the chair of the planning commission.
Each member of the planning commission is entitled to the compensation the county commissioners consider appropriate.
